name: places/ChIJI8023uhYwokRphzuEQiQmNU
formattedAddress: 130 E 67th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 130 E 67th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Office Staff was friendly and attentive. Dr. Mizhiritsky was amazing! He listened to my issue and asked open ended questions in order to fully understand my chronic pain of 4 years. I was scheduled for testing within a few days and results were provided immediately with next step solutions. I would highly recommend this specialist and his team as I will be continuing to visit this office.

text.text: Office Staff was friendly and attentive. Dr. Mizhiritsky was amazing! He listened to my issue and asked open ended questions in order to fully understand my chronic pain of 4 years. originalText.text: Ridiculously expensive even with in network insurance, 1 8 minute appointment cost $200. I don't think he was thorough or took the time to understand the issue. It seemed like Dr. Mizhiritsky wanted to see as many patients as possible in the shortest amount of time in order to make the most money. I truly do not think Dr. Mizhiritsky cared about my back pain and he came off very rude. Maybe I caught him on a bad day, but he was very nasty to me. The visit was over and done with in 8 mins (yes I actually timed it). He didn't bother to explain the next steps or what he though the issue might be. As soon as I got home, I called and cancelled my follow up appointment. Never going back again.

originalText.text: I recently made two visits to this doctor's office for a terrible sciatic pain. He sent me for MRI on the first visit, I have to come back to him to see the MRI result and he also did nerve test. He did not explain why I need it done. He did not tell me anything after the test. I asked the front deck if i can get a report of the test she said she has to type it up and will send to me the next day, of course that didn't happen. I then called a few days later (by the way there is no direct number you can call and speak to anyone in that office), the call center told me that i have to make another visit to see the result. She said she would leave a message for the office to call me back, that didn't happen either. The bill for the two visits submitted to my insurance rendered $5650. I am under such horrible pain and they make me go back to the office again and again. I would never use this doctor again.

originalText.text: I had a reoccurring neck pain from working for a long hours in front of the computer, so I went to see Dr. Mizhiritsky after few recommendations. Dr. was very nice and professional. Examination was very through, and I felt very confident that the Dr. can help me.  I think Dr. Mizhiritsky is very good back and neck specialist particular if you have chronic pains. I strongly recommend him.

I strongly recommend him.

originalText.text: On the recommendation of a friend, I went to see Dr Mizhiritsky for a another opinion/evaluation for my diagnosed cervical radiculopathy (pinched nerve in spine in neck).  He was knowledgeable and clear.  He answered all my questions and made useful recommendations.  In short, I got what I came for.
